records.Name: Bytel Call-in Strategy
records.StrategyXML__c: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><RecommendationStrategy xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><description>Bytel Call-in Strategy</description><if><description>If payment is past due request payment else churn</description><name>IfPaymentPastDueElseChurnNode</name><parentNode>RootNode</parentNode><branch><child>LoadPpd</child><expression>NOT(ISBLANK($Record.Contact.Payment_Due_Date__c)) && ($Record.Contact.Payment_Due_Date__c < (TODAY() - 30))</expression></branch><branch><child>LowCsatIfNode</child><expression>true</expression></branch><onlyFirstMatch>true</onlyFirstMatch></if><if><description>If node which only does churn if CSAT is less than 7</description><name>LowCsatIfNode</name><parentNode>IfPaymentPastDueElseChurnNode</parentNode><branch><child>ChurnExtendIfNode</child><expression>$Record.Contact.CSAT__c < 7</expression></branch><branch><child>CrossSellUnionNode</child><expression>true</expression></branch><onlyFirstMatch>true</onlyFirstMatch></if><if><description>If node to select one churn extend prop</description><name>ChurnExtendIfNode</name><parentNode>LowCsatIfNode</parentNode><branch><child>LoadExtendPromoRate</child><expression>NOT(ISBLANK($Record.Contact.Promotion_Ended_Date__c)) && ($Record.Contact.Promotion_Ended_Date__c > (TODAY() - 60)) && ($Record.Contact.Promotion_Ended_Date__c < TODAY())</expression></branch><branch><child>LoadExtendCurrentOffer</child><expression>NOT(ISBLANK($Record.Contact.Offer_Changed_Date__c)) && ($Record.Contact.Offer_Changed_Date__c > (TODAY() - 60)) && ($Record.Contact.Offer_Changed_Date__c < TODAY())</expression></branch><onlyFirstMatch>true</onlyFirstMatch></if><if><description>If node to select cross sell if has adsl</description><name>HasAdslIfNode</name><parentNode>CrossSellUnionNode</parentNode><branch><child>NoMobileIfNode</child><expression>$Record.Contact.Has_ADSL_Service__c == true</expression></branch><branch><child>NoTvBundleIfNode</child><expression>$Record.Contact.Has_ADSL_Service__c == true</expression></branch><onlyFirstMatch>false</onlyFirstMatch></if><if><description>If node to select adsl service if no adsl</description><name>NoAdslIfNode</name><parentNode>CrossSellUnionNode</parentNode><branch><child>HasMobileIfNode2</child><expression>$Record.Contact.Has_ADSL_Service__c == false</expression></branch><onlyFirstMatch>true</onlyFirstMatch></if><if><description>If node to select mobile service if no mobile</description><name>NoMobileIfNode</name><parentNode>HasAdslIfNode</parentNode><branch><child>LoadMobileService</child><expression>$Record.Contact.Has_Mobile_Service__c == false</expression></branch><onlyFirstMatch>true</onlyFirstMatch></if><if><description>If node to select tv bundle if no tv bundle</description><name>NoTvBundleIfNode</name><parentNode>HasAdslIfNode</parentNode><branch><child>HasMobileIfNode1</child><expression>$Record.Contact.Has_TV_Bundle__c == false</expression></branch><onlyFirstMatch>true</onlyFirstMatch></if><if><description>If node to select tv bundle if mobile</description><name>HasMobileIfNode1</name><parentNode>NoTvBundleIfNode</parentNode><branch><child>LoadTvBundle</child><expression>$Record.Contact.Has_Mobile_Service__c == true</expression></branch><onlyFirstMatch>true</onlyFirstMatch></if><if><description>If node to select adsl service if mobile</description><name>HasMobileIfNode2</name><parentNode>NoAdslIfNode</parentNode><branch><child>LoadAdslService</child><expression>$Record.Contact.Has_Mobile_Service__c == true</expression></branch><onlyFirstMatch>true</onlyFirstMatch></if><masterLabel>SomeMasterLabel</masterLabel><recommendationLimit><description>Filter if any reactions.</description><name>AdslReactionFilter</name><parentNode>HasMobileIfNode2</parentNode><lookbackDuration>0</lookbackDuration><maxRecommendationCount>1</maxRecommendationCount></recommendationLimit><recommendationStrategyName>Bytel Call-in Strategy</recommendationStrategyName><soqlLoad><description>load payment past due</description><name>LoadPpd</name><parentNode>IfPaymentPastDueElseChurnNode</parentNode><soql>SELECT Name, Description, ActionReference FROM Proposition WHERE Name='Payment Past Due'</soql></soqlLoad><soqlLoad><description>load extend promo rate</description><name>LoadExtendPromoRate</name><parentNode>ChurnExtendIfNode</parentNode><soql>SELECT Name, Description, ActionReference FROM Proposition WHERE Name='ExtendPromoRate'</soql></soqlLoad><soqlLoad><description>load extend current offer</description><name>LoadExtendCurrentOffer</name><parentNode>ChurnExtendIfNode</parentNode><soql>SELECT Name, Description, ActionReference FROM Proposition WHERE Name='ExtendCurrentOffer'</soql></soqlLoad><soqlLoad><description>load cross sell mobile service</description><name>LoadMobileService</name><parentNode>NoMobileIfNode</parentNode><soql>SELECT Name, Description, ActionReference FROM Proposition WHERE Name='Mobile Service'</soql></soqlLoad><soqlLoad><description>load cross sell tv bundle</description><name>LoadTvBundle</name><parentNode>HasMobileIfNode1</parentNode><soql>SELECT Name, Description, ActionReference FROM Proposition WHERE Name='TV Bundle'</soql></soqlLoad><soqlLoad><description>load cross sell adsl service</description><name>LoadAdslService</name><parentNode>AdslReactionFilter</parentNode><soql>SELECT Name, Description, ActionReference FROM Proposition WHERE Name='ADSL Service'</soql></soqlLoad><union><description>the root</description><name>RootNode</name><parentNode xsi:nil="true"/><removeDuplicates>true</removeDuplicates></union><union><description>Union node for cross sell</description><name>CrossSellUnionNode</name><parentNode>LowCsatIfNode</parentNode><removeDuplicates>true</removeDuplicates></union></RecommendationStrategy>

records.Name: Bytel Call-in Strategy 2
records.StrategyXML__c: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><RecommendationStrategy xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><description>Bytel Call-in Strategy2</description><masterLabel>SomeMasterLabel2</masterLabel><recommendationLimit><description>Filter if any reactions.</description><name>ReactionFilter</name><parentNode>RootNode</parentNode><filterMode>Accepted</filterMode><filterMode>Rejected</filterMode><lookbackDuration>0</lookbackDuration><maxRecommendationCount>1</maxRecommendationCount></recommendationLimit><recommendationStrategyName>Bytel Call-in Strategy 2</recommendationStrategyName><soqlLoad><description>load cross sell adsl service 2</description><name>ADSL2</name><parentNode>ReactionFilter</parentNode><soql>SELECT Name, Description, ActionReference FROM Proposition WHERE Name='ADSL Service'</soql></soqlLoad><soqlLoad><description>load payment past due</description><name>Payment</name><parentNode>ReactionFilter</parentNode><soql>SELECT Name, Description, ActionReference FROM Proposition WHERE Name='Payment Past Due'</soql></soqlLoad><soqlLoad><description>load dynamic offers</description><name>Dynamic2</name><parentNode>ReactionFilter</parentNode><soql>SELECT Name, Description, ActionReference FROM Proposition WHERE Name LIKE '%Dynamic%'</soql></soqlLoad><union><description>the root</description><name>RootNode</name><parentNode xsi:nil="true"/><removeDuplicates>false</removeDuplicates></union></RecommendationStrategy>

records.Name: Bytel Call-in Strategy 3
records.StrategyXML__c: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><RecommendationStrategy xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><description>Bytel Call-in Strategy</description><masterLabel>SomeMasterLabel</masterLabel><recommendationLimit><description>Filter if any reactions.</description><name>AdslReactionFilter</name><parentNode>ReactionFilter</parentNode><lookbackDuration>0</lookbackDuration><maxRecommendationCount>1</maxRecommendationCount></recommendationLimit><recommendationStrategyName>Bytel Call-in Strategy 3</recommendationStrategyName><soqlLoad><description>load cross sell adsl service</description><name>ReactionFilter</name><parentNode>RootNode</parentNode><soql>SELECT Name, Description, ActionReference FROM Proposition WHERE Name='ADSL Service'</soql></soqlLoad><soqlLoad><description>load payment past due</description><name>LoadPpd</name><parentNode>ReactionFilter</parentNode><soql>SELECT Name, Description, ActionReference FROM Proposition WHERE Name='Payment Past Due'</soql></soqlLoad><union><description>the root</description><name>RootNode</name><parentNode xsi:nil="true"/><removeDuplicates>true</removeDuplicates></union></RecommendationStrategy>

records.Name: Test Strategy
records.StrategyXML__c: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><RecommendationStrategy xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><description>Strategy used for JS tests</description><masterLabel>Some master label</masterLabel><recommendationStrategyName>Test Strategy</recommendationStrategyName><union><description>the root</description><name>Union</name><parentNode xsi:nil="true"/><removeDuplicates>true</removeDuplicates></union></RecommendationStrategy>
